entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:39 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 01:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with a few flurries. Hazy late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 10:26 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:26 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 10:26 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
